title: End Times
description:
Joel Trustworthy, a confused young man trying to find himself, befriends Ray Easter (a man of spirit) and Vincent Weston (a man of the world,) who open the door to everything he doesn't know. The 3 of them are accepted to the Moonview Institute, a prestigious university that they think is their ticket to success. They come to realize that the people in charge are ruling everyone through "word magic", and work to free themselves and their loved ones from their mental spells.

https://www.wappinanimation.com/poster.png

Comic most likely discontinued. Series of illustrated books in the works.
author: Ryan Krzak
